title: Checking up (TEFC)
brief_description: Parents and teachers may find themselves questioning the value of new methods of learning which are being used in many British schools, and are being encouraged by the Schools Council and the Nuffield Foundation Mathematics Teaching Project. Examines the question of keeping individual records of day to day progress as opposed to conventional attainment tests.
